name: styled_string
description: Print styled text with a StyledString object that has an interface similar to String.

0.0.0.name: styled_string
0.0.0.description: Print styled text with a StyledString object that has an interface similar to String.
0.0.0.readme:
StyledString
============

`StyledString` has an interface similar to String, but allows you to represent styled text that can be rendered to the terminal.

For now, see the `tests.js` for usage.
